statements: SELECT * FROM cost_savings_energy_arbitrage_strategy;
SELECT energy_saved, cost_savings FROM cost_savings_energy_arbitrage_strategy ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(energy_saved) AS avg_energy_saved, SUM(cost_savings) AS total_cost_savings FROM cost_savings_energy_arbitrage_strategy;
SELECT * FROM cost_savings_energy_arbitrage_strategy WHERE energy_consumed > 100 AND cost_savings > 50;
SELECT id, timestamp, energy_consumed FROM cost_savings_energy_arbitrage_strategy WHERE energy_saved = 0 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, timestamp, energy_consumed, energy_saved, cost_savings FROM cost_savings_energy_arbitrage_strategy;
SELECT * FROM cost_savings_energy_arbitrage_strategy WHERE cost_savings > 100;
SELECT id, timestamp, energy_saved FROM cost_savings_energy_arbitrage_strategy WHERE energy_consumed < 50;
SELECT id, cost_savings FROM cost_savings_energy_arbitrage_strategy ORDER BY cost_savings DESC;
SELECT * FROM cost_savings_energy_arbitrage_strategy WHERE cost_savings < 50 AND energy_consumed > 30;
SELECT * FROM energy_costs
SELECT energy_price, energy_consumed FROM energy_costs
SELECT timestamp, energy_saved FROM energy_costs WHERE energy_saved > 0
SELECT * FROM energy_costs ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM energy_costs WHERE energy_price BETWEEN 0.05 AND 0.1
SELECT * FROM energy_costs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT energy_price, energy_consumed FROM energy_costs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT AVG(energy_saved) AS average_saved FROM energy_costs
SELECT * FROM energy_costs WHERE energy_price > 0.1 ORDER BY energy_price
SELECT * FROM arbitrage_strategies WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-01-15'
SELECT * FROM EnergyRates;
SELECT rate_name, rate_per_kWh FROM EnergyRates WHERE rate_per_kWh > 0;
SELECT rate_name, rate_per_kWh FROM EnergyRates ORDER BY rate_per_kWh DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT c.date, c.energy_consumed, e.rate_name FROM EnergyConsumption c JOIN EnergyRates e ON c.rate_id = e.rate_id ORDER BY c.date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM EnergyRates WHERE rate_per_kWh > 0.5 ORDER BY rate_name DESC;
SELECT rate_name, rate_per_kWh FROM EnergyRates WHERE rate_id IN (2, 4, 6) ORDER BY rate_per_kWh ASC;

SELECT ec.date, ec.energy_consumed, er.rate_per_kWh FROM EnergyConsumption ec JOIN EnergyRates er ON ec.rate_id = er.rate_id WHERE ec.date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY ec.energy_consumed DESC;

SELECT cs.date, cs.cost_saved, er.rate_per_kWh FROM CostSavings cs JOIN EnergyConsumption ec ON cs.consumption_id = ec.consumption_id JOIN EnergyRates er ON ec.rate_id = er.rate_id WHERE cs.cost_saved > 1000 ORDER BY cs.date ASC;
SELECT AVG(rate_per_kWh) AS avg_rate_per_kWh FROM EnergyRates;
SELECT * FROM energy_data;
SELECT energy_demand, energy_price FROM energy_data WHERE energy_demand > 100;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM strategy_data ORDER BY strategy_name DESC;
SELECT market_name, market_region FROM energy_market WHERE market_region = 'Europe';
SELECT strategy_data.strategy_name, cost_savings.savings_amount FROM strategy_data INNER JOIN cost_savings ON strategy_data.strategy_id = cost_savings.strategy_id;
SELECT * FROM energy_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT energy_demand, energy_price FROM energy_data WHERE energy_demand > 100 ORDER BY energy_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_market WHERE market_region = 'Europe' AND market_name LIKE '%Renewable%' ORDER BY market_name;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM strategy_data WHERE LENGTH(strategy_description) > 50;
SELECT market_id, market_name, market_region FROM energy_market WHERE market_region IN ('Europe', 'Asia') ORDER BY market_id;
SELECT * FROM EnergyPrices ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT price, timestamp FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE consumption > 100 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT MAX(production) AS max_production, MIN(production) AS min_production FROM EnergyProduction
SELECT * FROM ArbitrageOpportunities WHERE potential_profit > 500 ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT AVG(profit) AS avg_profit FROM ArbitrageTransactions
SELECT * FROM EnergyPrices ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT timestamp, consumption FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE consumption > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT AVG(production) AS average_production FROM EnergyProduction GROUP BY timestamp HAVING average_production > 500
SELECT * FROM ArbitrageOpportunities WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND end_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT opportunity_id, SUM(profit) AS total_profit FROM ArbitrageTransactions GROUP BY opportunity_id ORDER BY total_profit DESC
